thread.title_full: HS football with Da Blitz - Sat, Oct 10, 2015

title: HS football with Da Blitz - Sat, Oct 10, 2015
text:
HS football with Da Blitz - Sat, Oct 10, 2015 Published 6:11 PM HST Oct 10, 2015 A Large Text Photos 
Rain or shine, it's time for "Da Blitz" where we give you a weekly rundown on the high school football games you couldn’t go to. Related 
Click here to get last night's scores and a review of the games. 
Last week on the Garden Isle, the Kapa’a Warriors had their best night with a 28-0 win over Waimea. 
On Saturday, the Warriors did it again against the Red Raiders for the third time this season. Final score: 17-0. 
More information will be updated as the games are being completed. 
Remaining: Pearl City vs. Kalaheo, Campbell vs. Kaiser, Kalani vs. Nanakuli, Hawaii Prep vs. KS-Hawaii, Maui vs. Lahainaluna
